General.Name: Zhengyuan Geomatics Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhengyuan Geomatics Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, and sale of surveying and mapping geographic information system integration and application services in China. It serves urban construction, planning, land, railway, transportation, water conservancy, environmental protection, agriculture, forestry, marine, and other industries. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
